name: The Long Road Ahead
description:
The Long Road Ahead 

This is a short creepy tale inspired by Chinese culture. 

It tells the tale of Liang and Ying as they travel back to Liang's hometown. During their journey home, a dark presence looms close by.

Game features

  • Narrative driven gameplay
  • Paper craft art style
  • Original Soundtrack

Stay in touch!

Email: cellarvaultgames@gmail.com

Follow us on: 
Facebook: /CellarVault
Twitter: @CellarVault

  • A short experience meant to act as an experiment to story telling through this medium. More stories to follow in a similar vein.
  • A Surround Sound Headset Recommended for better Experience. #horror
